title: Revionics Presents “Smart Pricing in an Omni-Channel World” at ECR Tag 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 3:00 AM   Revionics, Inc. 
AUSTIN, Texas -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Revionics, Inc. , a global provider of End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions , today announced that they will be presenting and exhibiting at the ECR Tag 2015 annual event taking place 23-24 September 2015 at the World Conference Centre in Bonn, Germany. 
Florian Strecker, Revionics Regional Director for Central and Eastern Europe, will present on “Smart Pricing in an Omni-channel World with the Help of Big Data” 24 September 2015, 3:25 - 3:45 p.m. (CEST)/15.25-15.45. The presentation will discuss the growing competition and mounting pressures retailers are experiencing in today’s Omni-channel retail world and how they can compete more profitably in this environment with proven pricing and promotion solutions that leverage Big Data analytics. Augmenting merchant art with today’s cutting edge demand-responsive analytics that incorporate price elasticity, strategic goal-based analysis and sophisticated price management capabilities ensures retailers have the right price at the right time, for the right shopper through the right channel. Revionics clients typically see a 10x ROI. 
Revionics will also be demonstrating its Price Optimization and Promotion Optimization solutions at stand B10. Surgically and dynamically execute competitive positions Provide real-time competitive alerting and systematic re-optimization Automate pricing rules Execute compelling and profitable promotions Forecast and measure pricing and promotion impact 
If you are interested in seeing how a shopper-centric, responsive pricing model can drive a sustainable competitive advantage, click here to register for the event and schedule a meeting with Revionics at info@revionics.com .

About Revionics, Inc. 
Revionics is a proven leader in End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions. Over 40,000+ retail locations around the world optimize with Revionics across 18M+ products and 2.2B+ SKU/store combinations are modeled weekly. Revionics empowers retailers around the globe to profitably execute a data-driven omnichannel merchandising strategy by utilizing one of the most comprehensive set of shopper demand signals to increase financial performance and improve customer satisfaction. Revionics’ solutions are powered by unmatched demand-based science and advanced predictive analytics to help ensure retailers have the right product, price, promotion, placement and space allocation to drive business performance and seamless shopper experience – online, in-store, social and mobile. Delivered on a scalable, SaaS-based platform, Revionics solutions offer real-time insights and dynamic decisions at speed, scale and frequency, while providing fast ROI. Revionics has been recognized as a Deloitte Technology Fast 500™ and JMP Securities’ Hot 100 Software Company. To learn how you can compete more profitably, please visit www.revionics.com .
